faqs.question: How to withdraw ?
answer: Your cashback will be added to your wallet within 3 days after your completed purchases.
Waffur must be the last link you clicked in order to get cashback.
You might not receive cashback for taxes, delivery charges, returns, exchanges, cancellations, reselling or fraud activities.

faqs.question: How to edit my personal data ?
answer: Go to the Profile tab, tap Edit, then update your name, email or phone.
Donâ€™t forget to save at the bottom!

faqs.question: How to activate cashback ?
answer: Tap on any participating merchant link in Waffur before you shop.
Make sure your order goes through that same session.

faqs.question: What is pending money ?
answer: Pending money is the cashback that you have earned but not yet received.
It will be added to your wallet within 3 days after your completed purchases.

faqs.question: What are cashback terms ?
answer: Cashback is only available for new users.
Cashback is not available for taxes, delivery charges, returns, exchanges, cancellations, reselling or fraud activities.
Cashback is only available for purchases made through Waffur.

faqs.question: How to delete my account ?
answer: Go to the Profile tab, tap Edit, then tap Delete Account.
You will be asked to confirm your decision.

faqs.question: How to change my password ?
answer: Go to the Profile tab, tap Edit, then tap Change Password.
